attributes.action: stop a proposed ban on swords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do this as a sword colector i see it important not to complete ban swords, but perhaps to make stricter sellings of the item's. Or perhaps a liscense to be introduced, rather than an all over ban.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
